Workshop Materials

Want to organize a study group or lead a workshop based off of these tutorials? Here are the tutorials in different formats.

Coming soon: A complete kit to help organizers host a workshop, including clues on logistics, planning, and potential pitfalls. Feel free to submit a pull request for help!
